summary: The customer called to inquire about Contoso Wireless' streaming product. The agent provided information about the product, which is available for $9.99 per month and compatible with all devices. The subscription also comes with extra features such as parental controls and access to exclusive content. Additionally, customers get access to the rewards program, which offers discounts and free shipping on select items. Finally, new subscribers can take advantage of the 30-day free trial before committing to a subscription.
